review: Works very well. So practical. Work with the device you have, Android or iOS, Also with Windows or Ubuntu
author: Jorge Miguel

review: It works really well and I really enjoy being able to use my tablet as a remote. Chromecast works really well with all of my streaming apps. The only problem I've ever has was with the device becoming de-synced or freezing.
author: Penguin

review: I bought 3 !!! One for each member of my family !
author: IntegrityMomma

review: The chromecat HDMI streaming media player was exactly as described and exactly what I wanted and needed.
author: bill moore

review: FRIENDS, THIS DEVICE IS OUT OF EARTH, I ENJOY MOVIES AT FULL TV SCREEN!!
author: Willie Torres

review: Works very well! Just remember that not every video source can be "cast" to Chromecast. And some sources require a monthly subscription fee, such as ABC, CBS, HBO, etc. Using Chrome browser in Windows lets you cast pretty much anything by using the Chromecast Add-on. Overall, very much worth the cost!
author: Dave

review: really bad wifi connection. constantly pauses
